title: .vsls.json - Visual Studio Live Share config file

gitignore.description: Specifies whether the contents of .gitignore files should be used to control file access for guests. A value of "hide" (the default) will hide any files/folders matching patterns in .gitignore from the file tree but can be reached when following or debugging if the host steps into them. A value of "exclude" will prevent them from ever being sent to the guest even while following or debugging. A value to "none" will turn off .gitignore processing.

hideFiles.description: Hides files/folders so they do not appear in a guest's file tree. Unlike excluded files, hidden files may be reached by guests while following or debugging if the host enters the file. Value is an array of glob-style file patterns. Prefix patterns with a "!" to reverse a rule.

excludeFiles.description: Excludes files/folders from a collaboration session so they are never sent to guests (even while following or debugging). Value is an array of glob-style file patterns. Prefix patterns with a "!" to reverse a rule.
